content: Credit Card Cashback OCBC 365 Card Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked 2w agoAny card recommendations for a monthly spend of $500-$600 on Caltex and $200-$300 on bills contributing to an average total monthly spend from $1000 - $1200?I am looking at OCBC 365 CC since the min. spend is $800 and I should be able to clear the min spending for the higher tiers of cashback.1 answerAnswerBump0
